Package com.ccms.portal.repository

Interface CreditCardRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<CreditCardEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<CreditCardEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<CreditCardEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<CreditCardEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<CreditCardEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<CreditCardEntity>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<CreditCardEntity,Long>
@Repository public interface CreditCardRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<CreditCardEntity,Long>

  • Method Details

    • findAllByUserIdWithCardType

      @Query("SELECT c FROM CreditCardEntity c JOIN FETCH c.cardType WHERE c.user.id = :userId") List<CreditCardEntity> findAllByUserIdWithCardType(@Param("userId") Long userId)

    • sumCreditLimitByUserId

      @Query("SELECT COALESCE(SUM(c.creditLimit), 0) FROM CreditCardEntity c WHERE c.user.id = :userId AND c.cardStatus = \'ACTIVE\'") Double sumCreditLimitByUserId(@Param("userId") Long userId)

    • sumAvailableLimitByUserId

      @Query("SELECT COALESCE(SUM(c.availableLimit), 0) FROM CreditCardEntity c WHERE c.user.id = :userId AND c.cardStatus = \'ACTIVE\'") Double sumAvailableLimitByUserId(@Param("userId") Long userId)

    • countByUserId

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(c) FROM CreditCardEntity c WHERE c.user.id = :userId") long countByUserId(@Param("userId") Long userId)

    • countByUserIdAndStatus

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(c) FROM CreditCardEntity c WHERE c.user.id = :userId AND c.cardStatus = :status") long countByUserIdAndStatus(@Param("userId") Long userId, @Param("status") CardStatus status)

    • existsByIdAndUserId

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(c) > 0 FROM CreditCardEntity c WHERE c.id = :cardId AND c.user.id = :userId") boolean existsByIdAndUserId(@Param("cardId") Long cardId, @Param("userId") Long userId)
